 2004-08512004-07-20,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActPublic Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Act
PrecisOrder (a) transferring the control and supervision of the OFFICE OF INDIAN RESIDENTIAL SCHOOLS RESOLUTION OF CANADA to the SOLICITOR GENERAL OF CANADA; and (b) directing that he or she shall preside over it; effective July 20, 2004.
